QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Arathi Highlands!
QuestData.Description: By order of his royal highness, King Anduin Wrynn, all able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to Captain Nials at Refuge Pointe.$B$BAncient Stromgarde's honor must be redeemed! Too long have ogres and criminals sullied its streets. Travel north from the Wetlands and cross the Thandol Span to reach Arathi. Follow the road to Refuge Pointe and present yourself to the captain.$B$BFor the glory and honor of the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Captain Nials at Refuge Pointe in Arathi Highlands.
QuestData.RewardText: Would that you were a company, but we'll have to make do with with what we have.
